title: Koadharber
author: Koadharber
created_time: January 31, 2023, 05:01:08 PMLast edit: February 01, 2023, 12:26:35 PM by Koadharber

comments.author: NFTmetria
comments.body: Very handy app with good design. I wonder who is the liquidity operator? Who supplies volumes?

comments.author: Koadharber
comments.body: Quote from: NFTmetria on February 01, 2023, 01:29:27 AMVery handy app with good design. I wonder who is the liquidity operator? Who supplies volumes?Very nice question!And to answer the question, we don't operate as an independent exchange instead we partner with ALPACA, a US brokerage. No liquidity is needed as it is connected straight to the US stock exchange.
